structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section:
To be eligible to sign any referendum petition described in this section, a person shall:
Live in the district or jurisdiction that will be affected by the referendum; and
Be a registered voter.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 54, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2012.
